name: 程式語言結構
description: 本課程主要在介紹程式語言的基本理論與相關環境，並探討各類程式語言的特性。
goals: 能了式語言的基本理論
能增進程式語言的學習能力
syllabus:
使修課同學瞭解程式語言結構的理論並進一步增強程式設計的能力．  
  
“Evolution of the Major Programming Languages”  
“Describing Syntax and Semantics, Lexical and Syntax Analysis”, “Names, Bindings, Type Checking and Scopes”, “Data Types”, “Expressions and Assignment Statements”, “Statement-Level Control Structures”, “Subprograms”,“Implementing Subprograms”, “Abstract Data Types”, “Support for Object-Oriented Programming”, “Concurrency”, “Exception Handling”.  
  
  
修課要求：  
Exercises, midterm, final, and software project.  
  
Text book：  
Concepts of Programming Languages, Addison Wesley; 9 edition (2007) . Robert W. Sebesta, Addison-Wesley.

methodologies.note: 使用投影片教授，引導同學研讀教科書內容
期末同學要完成一個以Java實做的軟體
